about_the_game:
Ohjata aims to reinvent the survivors like genre, by bringing skill, challenge and traditional rogue-like synergies to the center stage.

REDIRECT YOUR WEAPON

In Ohjata, you will use a unique redirect mechanic to defeat your enemies. This mechanic is central to the game and will need to be mastered to prevail against your enemies and uncover the world's secrets.

Your redirect ability can be improved as you level up and make progress, giving you the ability to redirect more often, or make your weapon move faster. Be careful though: losing your projectile against a wall or out of screen will result in a lengthy reload.

UPGRADE THROUGH THE RUN

Each level, you will gain upgrades that will drastically alter the way you play the game.

Gather powerful weapon upgrades, stats buffs and synergies for your build ! Overcome challenging random events and gain powerful build-defining relics !

GATHER GEMS

Gather gems during your runs to buy powerful mods and bend the rules for your future runs. Gems are dropped on the ground when you die, and will be available for you to pickup on your next run. Explore and find deposit boxes to secure gems before you die !

EXPLORE HANDCRAFTED MAP

Discover a hand-crafted map set in a volcanic landscape. Uncover the forge's secrets by exploring and pushing through different era's, each harder than the previous one. Solve puzzles, read enigmatic lore and defeat secret bosses !

short_description: Skillfully redirect your weapon to reach victory against hundreds of enemies and survive by taming the games mechanics in this challenging survivors inspired rogue like with low poly aesthetics. Collect tons of upgrades to create powerful synergies, and explore the map to unveil its secrets.
